metadata.name: Convert Prompt to Skill
metadata.shortDescription: Create structured skills from existing source file(s) following OLAF template
metadata.description: Generate new structured skills from one or more existing prompt files, preserving core functionality while applying OLAF template structure, principles, and comprehensive error handling. This is skill creation starting from existing source material rather than from scratch.
objectives: Create new prompts from existing source file(s) following established template exactly
Preserve and enhance core functionality from source material, merging multiple files when applicable
Apply prompting principles for clarity and execution
Generate complete skill structure with documentation
Update my-prompts competency manifest and offer reindexing for immediate discoverability
metadata.author: windsurf ai + p-square
